WorkItem.Description:
Quick reminder:
If you set more than 4000 styles, the formatting will explode.

This bug is explained here:
["Too many different cell formats" error message in Excel](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/213904/en)

My solution: avoid formatting n times n cells, rather use a get style RANGE:
example: 
> getStyle("B0:B99")->...
WorkItem.Summary: Too many different cell formats" error message in Excel
